lines.text: I don't know. She married a colonel, I think. Maybe it was a general. At any rate, she outranks all of us.
But that's wonderful! Now she'll have her lifelong ambition to lead the cotillion. Well, I guess that's what I always wanted too.
You don't have anything like that around here, do you, Captain?
Oh, I don't know. The Indians come down once a month and dance for us.
I'm afraid you hurt Mr. Balfour's feelings.
To do that I'd have to kick him in the pocketbook.
